headline: Nvidia’s Rally Shows DeepSeek Fears Were Unfounded a Year Later
summary: DeepSeek erased a record $589 billion from Nvidia Corp.’s market value in one day after the company revealed an AI model thought to be comparable to those of OpenAI and Meta Platforms Inc. and developed at a fraction of the cost.  Nvidia’s double-digit plunge led the S&P 500 Index 1.5% lower, while the tech heavy Nasdaq 100 Index shed 3%.
